office.title: Microsoft Word
office.desc: Who doesn't love Microsoft Word? I can easily recreate a hardcopy only document no problem!

office.title: Microsoft Excel
office.desc: Whenever I'm using this, I always want to use Python instead. At least I can apply the logic in the same way.

office.title: Microsoft PowerPoint
office.desc: I might make everything on Google Slides and export it as a .pttx. You'll never know if I took that shortcut or not.

office.title: Notion
office.desc: My number one friend in being organized. Heard that many workplaces use this too!.

coding.title: Java
coding.desc: Created games using Greenfoot API during high school. I vagree vhat vits very verbose.

coding.title: Python
coding.desc: Self-taught to use for data analysis. I also love using this to "scrape" websites using pyperclip.

coding.title: C++
coding.desc: My mom first told me that pointing is really rude. Now I do it practically.

coding.title: JavaScript
coding.desc: ReactJS, NodeJS; Self-taught to create personal projects. I don't know what I'd do if the debugger never existed.

coding.title: CSS
coding.desc: This is not fun at first. Currently, still not that fun.

coding.title: VSCode
coding.desc: I normally assume that anyone who uses an IDE other than VSCode is x10000000 smarter than me.

devTools.title: Git
devTools.desc: Linus Torvalds, you are a legend.

devTools.title: AutoHotkey
devTools.desc: This is my go-to to deal with repetitive mouse/keyboard use. I can easily automate any workflow using this

digitalArts.title: Adobe Photoshop
digitalArts.desc: I somehow passed the LinkedIn skills assessment first try

digitalArts.title: Figma
digitalArts.desc: I only know how to use this because I know how to use Photoshop

digitalArts.title: Blender 3D
digitalArts.desc: I got lots of exposure to keyframing and posing using Minecraft rigs found on the internet. I learned a lot of 2D/3D animation concepts through this software

digitalArts.title: Vegas Pro 15
digitalArts.desc: This basically implies I also know how to use Adobe Premiere

languages.title: French
languages.desc: Learned through Ontario public school education system, aka I'll stuck in a conversation on the 2nd sentence.

languages.title: Simplified Chinese
languages.desc: Native speaker. That just means I'll get stuck on the 5th sentence instead of the 2nd
